amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the bill all rules promulgated by the Department of Homeland Security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 249 (Roll no. 25).

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
